ai.summary: A short, easy 1.2 km hike in the UK on a gentle, well-maintained trail. Suitable for beginners and families.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail offers a flat to gently undulating route with a smooth surface. Expect minimal elevation changes, with some grassy patches and occasional roots.
ai.safety_notes: Always check local conditions before you go. Bring water, wear comfortable shoes, and dress for the weather. Stay on marked paths and watch for other hikers. In remote sections, carry a mobile phone and inform someone of your plans.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October). Summer evenings are popular; winters can be muddy or icy.

seo.meta_description: Explore the Blue Trail, a short and easy 1.2 km hike in the UK. Perfect for beginners and families seeking a quick outdoor experience.
